thread.title: NASCAR community reacts to Carl Edwards press conference
thread.title_full: NASCAR community reacts to Carl Edwards press conference

title: NASCAR community reacts to Carl Edwards press conference
text:
NASCAR community reacts to Carl Edwards press conference Tim Durr Jan 11, 2017 at 11:25a ET 0Shares 
Carl Edwards confirmed what FOXSports.com first reported Tuesday that he'll be stepping away from racing in 2017 and has no intentions of returning to NASCAR racing full-time. NASCAR via Getty Images Sean Gardner Statement from NASCAR Chairman & CEO Brian France on Carl Edwards “Carl Edwards has made an indelible mark on NASCAR. His hard-charging driving style has led to memorable moments that will live forever in the history of our sport. Carl’s passion and personality will greatly be missed – as will the signature backflips that NASCAR fans have come to expect following his victories. We wish Carl nothing but the best as he enters this next phase in life.”
